house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1978 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen,Garage Door Opener, Microwave, Pantry, Skylights, Storage Space
